content: rasta swirl by susan ashcroft yarn malabrigo rasta - one skein suggested needle size/gauge 9mm/us13 10 sts per 10cm/4 supplies one stitch marker malabrigo rasta on 9mm/us 13 colourway verde azul abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es p2tog = purl 2 sts together sl = slip_stitch purlwise with yarn in back 1/2 lc = place 1 st onto a cable needle or hold with your fingers - in front k2 then knit the 1 st held in front you can find more yarn ideas and projects linked to the pattern page on ravelry - link laurenw13 rasta on 9mm colourway sabiduria © ashcroft-hempsall 2020 - for personal non-commercial use only rasta swirl 2 making the cowl cast on 63 sts using cable cast-on hold the base of the stitches so that it s not too tight link for cable cast-on http //stitchnerd blogspot be/2011/10/cable-cast-on html set-up row *k3 p4 repeat from * to the end of the row place a marker and join to work in the round tip take care not to twist your stitches when joining - check again when you start round 2 because if you do have a twist you can still untwist then round 1 *sl1 k2 p4 repeat from * to the end of the round round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 *1/2lc p4 repeat from * to the end of the round round 4 *k3 p4 repeat from * to the end of the round rounds 5 7 repeat rounds 1-3 round 8 *k3 p2tog p2 repeat from * to end of the round 56 sts round 9 *sl1 k2 p3 repeat from * to the end of the round round 10 repeat round 9 round 11 *1/2lc p3 repeat from * to the end of the round round 12 *k3 p3 repeat from * to the end of the round repeat rounds 9-12 until you are ready to bind off stopping after a round 12 bind-off work in pattern knitting and purling and using lifted bind-off keep the bind off firm and even not too tight but not baggy either © ashcroft-hempsall 2020 - for personal non-commercial use only
